timeline.message: Enable maven support for bindgen tool

timeline.bodyText:
Still there is a packaging issue in maven resolver with jdk11 where we cannot run tests within module.
Functionality of the module can be verified by integration tests in packerina and bindgen tool
For this i have created a separate issue to enable
#26786
timeline.author: keizer619

timeline.bodyText: Removing the module-info.java here is intentional right?
timeline.author: IrushiL

replies.bodyText:
Yes Apache Maven Resolver has issues with JPMS
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/60915727/java-11-unnamed-module-issue-when-using-maven-model
replies.author: keizer619
